Title: Greek Salad
Ingredients: 2 cups diced seeded peeled cucumber (from about 1 large)
1 cup diced red bell pepper (from about 1 large)
1/4 cup pitted kalamata olives or other brine-cured black olives, halved
Instructions: Toss first 9 ingredients in medium bowl to blend.
Gently mix in cheese. Season with salt and pepper.
